import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';/**
 * HeroSection component
 * Displays a full‑viewport hero area with a simple fading slider.
 * Each slide contains a title, subtitle and call‑to‑action button.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeroSection=()=>{const slides=[{title:'Búsqueda de soluciones específicas',description:'para sus propiedades inmobiliarias',buttonLabel:'Más información',link:'#que-hacemos',className:'slide1'},{title:'Trato directo',description:'personalizado, eficaz y eficiente',buttonLabel:'Más información',link:'#servicios',className:'slide2'}];const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%slides.length);},7000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[slides.length]);const current=slides[index];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hero-section ".concat(current.className),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero-overlay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container hero-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:current.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:current.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:current.link,className:"btn btn-primary",children:current.buttonLabel})]})]});};export default HeroSection;
